title: #209: Raising Men: What Navy SEALs Teach Their Sons
description: A special Father's Day edition of the art of Manliness Podcast. Retired Navy SEAL Eric Davis talks to us about his book Raising Men: Lessons Navy SEALs Learned from Their Training and Taught Their Sons. We discuss lessons from SEAL training on teaching your kids personal responsibility, mental toughness, and leadership.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
